section.title: Overview
section.paragraph: This document details various business rules categorized by their nature. Many rules relate to configurable attributes, quality assurance, and content requirements.

section.title: 2. Quality Assurance & Process
section.paragraph: Bike data modules *must* be reviewed and approved by the EPWG (Engineering Product Working Group) before publication.

section.title: 3. Content & Data Requirements
section.paragraph: The Bike data set *must* contain examples demonstrating the application of constructs and principles representing various levels of conceptual sophistication.

section.title: Notes
section.paragraph: The categorization of some rules is based on interpretation of the provided data. It may be appropriate to re-categorize them based on further analysis or project needs. Rules pertaining to configurable attributes are considered data validation rules.
